verses.verse: Ephraim<WH669> feeds<WH7462> on wind,<WH7307> and follows<WH7291> after the east<WH6921> wind: he daily<WH3605> <WH3117> increases<WH7235> lies<WH3576> and desolation;<WH7701> and they do make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with the Assyrians,<WH804> and oil<WH8081> is carried<WH2986> into Egypt.<WH4714>

The LORD<WH3068> has also a controversy<WH7379> with Judah,<WH3063> and will punish<WH6485> Jacob<WH3290> according to his ways;<WH1870> according to his doings<WH4611> will he recompense<WH7725> him.
He took his brother<WH251> by the heel<WH6117> in the womb,<WH990> and by his strength<WH202> he had power<WH8280> with God:<WH430>

Yes, he had power<WH7786> over<WH413> the angel,<WH4397> and prevailed:<WH3201> he wept,<WH1058> and made supplication<WH2603> to him: he found<WH4672> him in Bethel,<WH1008> and there<WH8033> he spoke<WH1696> with us;
Even the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts;<WH6635> the LORD<WH3068> is his memorial.<WH2143>
Therefore turn<WH7725> you to your God:<WH430> keep<WH8104> mercy<WH2617> and judgment <WH4941>and wait<WH6960> on your God<WH430> continually.<WH8548>
He is a merchant,<WH3667> the balances<WH3976> of deceit<WH4820> are in his hand:<WH3027> he loves<WH157> to oppress.<WH6231>

And Ephraim<WH669> said,<WH559> Yet<WH389> I am become<WH6238> rich,<WH6238> I have found<WH4672> me out substance:<WH202> in all<WH3605> my labors<WH3018> they shall find<WH4672> none<WH3808> iniquity<WH5771> in me that were sin.<WH2399>

And I that am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> will yet<WH5750> make you to dwell<WH3427> in tabernacles,<WH168> as in the days<WH3117> of the solemn<WH4150> feast.<WH4150>
I have also spoken<WH1696> by the prophets,<WH5030> and I have multiplied<WH7235> visions,<WH2377> and used similitudes,<WH1819> by the ministry<WH3027> of the prophets.<WH5030>

Is there iniquity<WH205> in Gilead?<WH1568> surely<WH389> they are vanity:<WH7723> they sacrifice<WH2076> bullocks<WH7794> in Gilgal;<WH1537> yes,<WH1571> their altars<WH4196> are as heaps<WH1530> in the furrows<WH8525> of the fields.<WH7704>
And Jacob<WH3290> fled<WH1272> into the country<WH7704> of Syria,<WH758> and Israel<WH3478> served<WH5647> for a wife,<WH802> and for a wife<WH802> he kept<WH8104> sheep.
And by a prophet<WH5030> the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH5927> Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt,<WH4714> and by a prophet<WH5030> was he preserved.<WH8104>

Ephraim<WH669> provoked him to anger<WH3707> most<WH8563> bitterly:<WH8563> therefore shall he leave<WH5203> his blood<WH1818> on him, and his reproach<WH2781> shall his LORD<WH113> return<WH7725> to him.
